QWERTY:
enjoy the challenge life offers.
it is easy to find what you need,
if you understand clearly what it is.
it is important to set clear
goals and distribute priorities.
it is important to crearly realize goals
for a day, a month, a year, five years.
it is important to be tactful
with other people.
business has its laws;
we should act up to them.
business is attractive.
